Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Cicero
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Laramie and Harrison: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Laramie and Harrison: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Reroute near 111th/Morgan
ShortDescription: 111th/King Dr. buses temp. rerouted SB:111th, Halsted, 107th, Throop and 111th; NB:111th, Marshfield, 115th and Halsted: due to, st blockage near 111th/Morgan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 111th/Morgan, due to street blockage near 111th/Morgan.

Southbound buses will operate via 111th, Halsted, 107th, Throop and 111th and including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Northbound buses will operate via 111th, Marshfield, 115th, Halsted and 111th. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Southbound Reroute near California/Fullerton
ShortDescription: SB 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Fullerton, Milwaukee and California due to, street blockage near California/Fullerton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Fullerton, Milwaukee and California due to, street blockage near California/Fullerton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
